content.p: Find out about the different ways you can get work experience Find out about work experience opportunities exclusive to Nottingham students A list of sources of vacancies for work experience opportunities in the UK Get advice on what you need to think about and where to look for vacancies telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
